name: Regulations
text:
§264-73  Regulations.  The director of transportation may promulgate rules and regulations governing the erection and maintenance of outdoor advertising permitted under section 264-72, consistent with the safety and welfare of the traveling public and with the national standards promulgated by the Secretary of Transportation pursuant to Title 23, United States Code. [L 1966, c 45, pt of §2; HRS §264-73]
 
Cross References
 
  Rulemaking, see chapter 91.
